attributes.action: In view of the latest killing of a child on our streets, should there be a greater Police presence on the streets rigorously enforcing the policy of Stop and Search?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With yet another unnecessary and untimely death of a minor, and undoubtedly not the last without the will to shift away from a softly softly approach to dealing with an increasingly lawless society, I feel that the time has come to implement  more vigorous approach to at least make the lives of these low lifes more uncomfortable by increasing the use of Stop and search legislation.
